name: Memories of Vlast
description: Double-click to listen to the final messages from Vlast. Not usable in instances.

name: Recipe: Mordant Crusher
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Crusher recipe.

name: Highlands Survival Stash
description: Double-click to open.

name: Mini Sunspear Nagozi
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: 28-Slot Marshal's Locker
description: 28 slots. Weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted. Items in this box will never appear in a sell-to-vendor list.

name: Rabid Rascal Shoulders of the Engineer
Catmander's Compendium
description: Double-click to use. Unlock the ability to become a Commander.

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Helm
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Lost Saddlebag
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Runestone
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear runestone recipe.

name: Vlast Avenger
description:
Upon purchase, equips Vlast Avenger, a rifle that does extra damage to Vlast's enemies.
<c=@Flavor>Crafted by Lucius Anvilblade. Honed Slivers by Adisa. Vengeance by Vlast.</c>

name: Elonian Runestone
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Sulfuric Sand Sample
description: A sample of sulfuric sands that the djinn will find useful for their research.

name: Salomon's Riding Boots of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Djinn Palace Jackal Treat
description: A tasty treat for your jackal.

name: Dwarven Staff Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven staff.

name: Dwarven Staff Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven staff.

name: Dwarven Dagger Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Recipe Desert: Plate of Sugar Rib Roast
description: Recipe Desert Unlock: Double-click to unlock the recipe for Plate of Sugar Rib Roast.

name: Mini Sunspear Odurra
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Page of Spearmarshal Boot Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Boots. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Pyramid Card
description: <c=@flavor>Common, symbolizing stability, wealth, and a foundation of friends and family.</c>

name: Riddle of the Deadeye
description: <c=@Flavor>Mercy may not be pleasant.</c>

name: Imperial Cask of Djinnspit
description: <c=@Flavor>Probably not from actual djinn, this is the potent beverage that most Tyrians imagine when they think of Elonian wine.</c>

name: Mini Sunspear Traphez
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Luxurious Royal Fabric
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The Sunspear banner remains a symbol of heroism and unity.</c>

name: Mini Skimmer Mount
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Bounty Hunter's Mask
description: Double-click to learn the Bounty Hunter's Mask recipe.

name: Scrap of Desert Mastery
description: Grants a small amount of Crystal Desert Mastery experience.

name: Book of Bounty Hunter Glove Recipes
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Pauldron Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Shoulders.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Standard
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear standard recipe.

name: Highjump Ranch Springer Treat
description: A tasty treat for your springer.

name: Gilded Scarab Shell
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>The banner of Joko waves eternal over the clans of Elona.</c>

name: Mini Blue Catmander
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Mini Soulbeast Ebeleke Eze
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Ancient Surveyor's Tools
description: Double-click to turn 10 Ancient Surveyor's Tools into an Imperial Cadastral Suite.

name: Dwarven Axe Head
description: A broken piece of a dwarven axe.

name: Ancient Map
description: If you have lost your boundary markers, this may help.

name: Skimmer Treat from Harun
description: A tasty treat for your skimmer.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Cowl
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Cowl.

name: Recipe: Mordant Slayer
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Slayer recipe.

name: Tormented Tourmaline
description:
This item only has value as part of a collection and can be consumed without preventing progress.

<c=@Flavor>A gemstone of incredible clarity and unique color.</c>

name: Mini Holosmith Baraz Sharifi
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Mordant Crosier
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Crosier recipe.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Matchlock
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear matchlock recipe.

name: Writings of the Last Spearmarshal, Vol. 4
Black Lion Level-80 Booster
description:
Advances the current character to level 80. Grants a starting set of exotic gear and a box of items to get you started.

Use for details. You will be able to confirm/cancel.

name: Mini Sunspear Suti
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Marshal's Elonian Mantle
description:
Using this will unlock all weight classes of this skin.
An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Garden of the Gods Page 03
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Champion of Tyria Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Attuned Nadijeh's Dynastic Signet
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Confidential Order of Shadows Letter
description:
A secret letter that should be brought to Ahel Nakat, who is undercover in the Ruination among the Order of Shadows.

Double-click to locate.

name: Stash of Kournan Coins
description:
Grants a large amount of Crystal Desert Mastery experience.

<c=@Flavor>Formerly traded across Elona, but banned under Palawa Joko. These are still valued by collectors, scholars, and thieves.</c>

name: Star of Glory
description: Combine with Record of League Participation, Jar of Distilled Glory, and Condensed Spirit Energy in the Mystic Forge to create the Gift of Competitive Dedication.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Mantle
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Vambraces
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Pile of Elonian Trade Contracts
description:
"Business is life, and life is good!"
Anonymous Vabbian Trade Official

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Boot Lining
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Boots.

name: Knight's Winged Mantle of the Mesmer
Casino Coin
description:
Can be consumed for Crystal Desert Mastery experience or traded at Grand Sahil Casino for other rewards.

<c=@flavor>You won! Now indulge yourself at our world-class leisure destination. Zalambur</c>

name: 24-Slot Cowrie League Saddlebag
description: 24 slots. If possible, crafting materials and upgrade components will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Houndkeeper Vambraces of the Cavalier
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Feline Holoscepter
description: The inscription claims this can harmlessly entertain any domesticated cat. Purchase price includes immediate delivery to your home.

name: Glint's Crystalline Chest
description: Double-click to open.

name: Mini Weaver Folarin Oyekan
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: 28-Slot Hardened Leather Pannier
description: 28 Slots

name: Pristine Awakened Emblem
description: Proof of valor against the Awakened. Present it to the ghost of First Spear Dehvad in the Desolation for a reward.

name: Staff of the Lost of Severance
Forgotten Glyph
description: A seal etched with forgotten glyphs. Follower Xunn at Scattered Remnants in Elon Riverlands is looking for them.

name: Rabid Mist Scrim of the Revenant
Recipe: Harrier's Warbeast Tassets
description: Double-click to learn a crafting recipe.

name: Cleric's Visionary's Helm of the Guardian
Threat Report: Untraceable Sharpshooters
description: Double-click to gain a large amount of Mastery experience.

name: Warbeast Hardened Trouser Panel
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Leggings.

name: Iboga Petals
description: Double-click to open.

name: Inscription of the Spearmarshal
description: Used in crafting the Sunspear weapon set, using the Marshal's (+Power, +Healing, +Condition Damage, +Precision) stat combination.

name: Chest of the Bounty Hunter's Gloves
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Warbeast Hardened Shoulderguard Padding
description: Used to craft Hardened Leather Shoulders.

name: Vegetable Weights
description: <c=@Flavor>Even after endless revision by Awakened tax collectors, local markets still use an antique but well-known system.</c>

name: 24-Slot Hamaseen Pannier
description: 24 slots. If possible, junk items will fill this box first before other empty slots. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: Mini Zaishen Warrior
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Jackal
description: Activate this to unlock your mount and the associated Mastery track.

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Coat
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Mini Vabbian Clown
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Recipe: Mordant Brazier
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Brazier recipe.

name: Dwarven Dagger Pommel
description: A broken piece of a dwarven dagger.

name: Raptor Treat from Priest Hakim
description: A tasty treat for your raptor.

name: Bonestrand Jackal Treat
description: A tasty treat for your jackal.

name: Intelligence Report: Palawa Joko I Page 05
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Survival Supplies
description: Consuming this item provides bonus Trade Contracts.

name: Superior Rune of the Soulbeast
description:
Element: Skill
Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.

bonuses: When you have an active pet, gain condition damage equal to 7% of your power. When you do not have an active pet, gain toughness equal to 7% of your condition damage.

name: Skimmer
description: Activate this to unlock your mount and the associated Mastery track.

name: Recipe: Sunspear Greatblade
description: Double-click to learn a Sunspear greatblade recipe.

name: Mordant Inscription
description: Used in crafting the Mordant weapon set, using the Harrier's (+Power, +Healing, +Concentration) stat combination.

name: Rabid Eagle-Eye Goggles of the Engineer
Mini Prairie Dog
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Shinies Bag
description: A bag of shinies that bandits stole from Ket'abatchk.

name: Trophy of the Champion Spellbreaker
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Dreaded Banners of King Palawa Joko I
32-Slot Gossamer Saddlebag
description:
32 Slots

Can be exchanged for a non-soulbound version at merchants in Amnoon.

name: Mini Queen Dahlah
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Riddle of the Holosmith
description: <c=@Flavor>Neither light nor heat can be held, but both can be felt.</c>

name: Short Elonian Column
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: Mini Sand Eel
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Dwarven Shield Back
description: A broken piece of a dwarven shield.

name: Warbeast Gossamer Helm Padding
description: Used to craft Gossamer Helms.

name: Royal Funerary Headgear Box
description: Double-click to choose a piece of light, medium, or heavy armor.

name: Swaggering Hat
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other helmet. This skin will be unlocked in your wardrobe for future use.

name: Fragile Prism
description: Double-click to open.

name: Recipe: Mordant Key
description: Double-click to learn a Harrier's Mordant Key recipe.

name: Shadi's Shopping List
description: Double-click to read.

name: Mini Sunspear Kina
description: Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

name: Elonian Horn
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.

name: Confidential Order of Shadows Letter
description: A secret letter that should be brought to Ahel Nakat, who is undercover in the Ruination among the Order of Shadows.

name: Attuned Gift of the Hidden Scion
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Plan for Harrier's Warbeast Boots
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: 28-Slot Nomad's Locker
description: 28 slots. If possible, weapons and armor will fill this box before other empty spaces. The contents of this box will not move when inventory is sorted.

name: The Legacy Page 06
description: A book fragment worn away by the desert sands. It will need to be completed before reading. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.

name: Riddle of the Spellbreaker
description: <c=@Flavor>Amidst the mighty cries of dragons, silence is deafening.</c>

name: Tall Elonian Column
description: A decoration schematic that is processed by the guild's assembly device to make the decoration.

name: El, Left Hand of Joko of Severance
Mostly-Digested Boots
description:
Salvage Item
<c=@Flavor> Elona's cobblers are probably deserving of more praise, considering the longevity of their works.</c>

name: Priestess Card
description: <c=@flavor>This card is very rare, and prized: it symbolizes wisdom, courage, deep connections to the past and future, and rebirth.</c>

name: Recipe: Sunset Ring
description: A recipe to make a Sunset Ring.

name: Assassin's Green Wood Longbow of Rage
Recipe: Bowl of Lentil Soup
description: Recipe Unlock: Double-click to unlock the Chef recipe for Bowl of Lentil Soup.

name: Blessing of Dignity
description: Double-click to gain a reward.

name: Skimmer Treat from Majid
description: A tasty treat for your skimmer.

name: The Legacy
description: With all of the pages together, the worn text is now legible.

name: Tarnished Memory Crystal
description: Double-click to open.

name: Warbeast Orichalcum Pauldron Casing
description: Used to craft Warbeast Orichalcum Shoulders.

name: Book of Bounty Hunter Shoulder Recipes
description: Double-click to select a crafting recipe.

name: Palawa's Personal Tapestry
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and can freely be sold to merchants.
<c=@Flavor>With your obeisance firmly established, you may now bear this standard to war in King Joko's name.</c>

name: Fiery Blade Axe
description:
Double-click to apply this look to any other axe. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>Long ago, heroes would bring proof of their exploits to the Battle Isles in hopes of claiming one of these weapons.</c>

name: Page of Spearmarshal Pants Recipes
description:
Double-click to pick a recipe for Spearmarshal Pants. Can be learned by armorsmiths, leatherworkers, and tailors.

Purchase these recipes from renown merchants in Elona after learning the base recipes from the story.

name: Recipe: Spearmarshal's Jerkin
description: A recipe to make a Spearmarshal's Jerkin.

name: Slab of Architectural-Grade Granite
description:
This item has no value outside of a collection and may be sold to vendors.
<c=@Flavor>Thousands of laborers quarried granite from the Crystal Desert to build these enormous tombs.</c>

name: Salomon's Cataphract Guard of the Rebirth
description: This rare armor contains bonus salvage.

name: Luminous Pillar
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Underworld Offering
description: Double-click to open.

name: Elonian Greatblade
description: An upgraded version of this can be crafted using recipes purchased throughout the Crystal Desert.
